column4: Does anyone know how to fix usb sound not working? I found a workaround to set the USB sound module to 0 instead of 1, but it won't work still.
Jaunty...9.04? yeah. Sorry, i'm new to linux :P

that's OK, go to "system->preferences->sound" in there you can configure which sound card to use.  I have music and movies configured to my USB card that is hooked up to my stereo, everything like firefox plays on my headphones
